title: Windows 11 build 22000.527 heads out to everyone with new features
content:
Microsoft has released Windows 11 build 22000.527 to all users as an optional update, bringing with it new taskbar features and more fixes. The update, labeled as KB5010414, initially rolled out to Windows Insiders last Friday (though the minor build number was 526), and now everyone can try it. You can download it manually here.

The post Windows 11 build 22000.527 heads out to everyone with new features appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Windows 11 build 22000.526 is now available to everyone as an optional update, adding weather to the taskbar, new Teams features, and more.
